file_content.text: I hear you made quick work of that Onslaught. The Terror Brigade delivered the Imperial Moff, as promised. Nicely done.
I don't envy you having to face that Onslaught. But you've got my thanks.
This has to be a joke. No way command would throw us a mission like this.
Seems I've been downgraded to "expendable." Go figure.
This Terror Brigade is always looking for a new combat thrill: unarmed ambushes, wrestling wampas, they've done it all.
Recently assaulted an Imperial base for kicks. Captured Moff Yoren, one of the Empire's chief strategists. Now they're offering to ransom him off to us.
You've got the right of it.
You familiar with the Terror Brigade? Group of ex-Mandalorians, all crazy as a snow cat with heatstroke.
Apparently they found the mercenary lifestyle on Hoth too boring, if you can believe it. Now they'll fight anything with a pulse: Republic, Imperial, doesn't matter.
I'll face this Onslaught.
I've beaten Mandalorians.
I'm sure. But these aren't your typical Mandos.
Disappointing, but I can't say I blame you.
If I don't do it, no one will.
Let me guess--there's a catch.
That's generous of them.
The Terror Brigade wants us to pass something called "the Onslaught" before they hand over the Moff.
Heard rumors about this Onslaught--chock-full of wild beasts and Terror Brigade wackos. Command has given my squad permission to try, but I doubt our odds are good.
Yeah, hand over some credits, get an Imperial military genius--sounds like a good deal, right? Wish it was that simple.
That's suicide.
"For the Republic." You know how it is.
You going through with it?
Not sure. Probably turn my back on the whole thing.
Moff Yoren has intel on every major Imperial campaign. We need him. But I'd rather not lead my people into some Mandalorian death trap.
Don't put up with that.
Already got our hands plenty full fighting off the Hailstorm Brotherhood.
Go on.
Then pay them. Simple.
Turns out the Mandos aren't interested in credits.
I've heard some impressive things about Havoc Squad. Sounds like this mission is right up your alley. Up for it?
You've got a reputation for surviving the impossible. Perfect candidate for the Onslaught, I'd say. Think you can handle it?
You want me to do it.
Er, yes, actually.
A Jedi's got a better chance of surviving this Onslaught than anyone. We need you to tackle this one for us.
No way. [Refuse quest]
Only survived because they were using makeshift weapons. Can't imagine the damage they'd do with a real arsenal.
Remember, that Onslaught was designed to break their strongest warriors. You watch yourself in there.
Appreciate it. I've fought the Terror Brigade before. Not too eager to relive the experience.
